title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Your Safety       Fires are allowed, but only in the picnic area. Fires must be in a grill or a container that will not damage the table, trees, grass or other park resources. Fires and other heat sources must be extinguished and completely cold before any materials are placed in park trash cans. Coals or other combustible materials should never be thrown into the vegetation.
